```{r}
# Loading data
EdgesDataset_s0friends <- read_csv(
  "class5_Archive/CogSci19S0_NetworkFriends.csv") %>% 
  subset(
    !is.na(to) & !is.na(from) & !is.na(weight) # removing odd NAs
  )
# Removing trolls
EdgesDataset_s0friends <- EdgesDataset %>% subset(
  !(to %in% c("fake0", "fake", "100", "1")) & !(from %in% c("fake0", "fake", "100", "1") & !is.na(to) & !is.na(from))
)
```

```{r}
#Creating list of nodes - creating a list of unique IDs across the 3 datasets
CogSci_2019_nodes <- data.frame(ID=unique(c(
  CogSci_2019_n0_edges$from,
  CogSci_2019_n1_edges$from,
  CogSci_2019_n4_edges$from,
  CogSci_2019_n0_edges$to,
  CogSci_2019_n1_edges$to,
  CogSci_2019_n4_edges$to)))

Graph <-
  graph_from_data_frame(d = EdgesDataset,
                        vertices = CogSci_2019_nodes,
                        directed = TRUE)

E(Graph)$arrow.mode <- 0
V(Graph)$label <- ""
E(Graph)$width <- edge_attr(Graph)$weight

plot(Graph,
     layout = layout_on_sphere, # Explore layouts!
     edge.arrow.size = 0.2)

wc1 <- cluster_walktrap(Graph)
plot(wc1, Graph)


```
